# Contribution Guidelines

Thank you for your interest in contributing to CoLedge-Money-Manage-Split!

## How to Contribute
1. **Fork the repository**: Click on the "Fork" button to create your own copy of the repository.
2. **Clone your fork**: Use `git clone https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/CoLedge-Money-Manage-Split.git` to clone your fork.
3. **Create a branch**: Create a new branch for your changes with `git checkout -b feature-branch-name`.
4. **Make changes**: Implement your changes and ensure that they work as expected.
5. **Push your changes**: Push your changes to your fork using `git push origin feature-branch-name`.
6. **Create a pull request**: Go to the original repository and open a pull request from your fork's branch.

## Code of Conduct
Please be respectful and considerate in your contributions. We want to create a welcoming space for everyone.

## Reporting Issues
If you find a bug or have a suggestion, please open an issue in the repository. Provide as much detail as possible to help us address it.

Thank you for helping us improve this project!
